name: Poison Spray
description: You spray toxic mist at a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 Poison damage.
higherLevelsDescription: The damage increases by 1d12 when you reach levels 5 (2d12), 11 (3d12), and 17 (4d12).

engineHook.notes: Requires ranged spell attack roll and damage application.
